issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Vectorization: Support PTF (Part 1: No Custom Window Framing -- Default Only)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Add disk storage backing.  Turn hive.vectorized.execution.ptf.enabled on by default.

Add hive.vectorized.ptf.max.memory.buffering.batch.count to specify the maximum number of vectorized row batch to buffer in memory before spilling to disk.

Add hive.vectorized.testing.reducer.batch.size parameter to have the Tez Reducer make small batches for making a lot of key group batches that cause memory buffering and disk storage backing.
fields.summary: Vectorization: Support PTF (Part 2: Unbounded Support-- Turn ON by default)

ATTACHMENT ID: 12892770 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Doc note:  This changes the default value of *hive.vectorized.execution.ptf.enabled*, which was introduced by HIVE-16369 in release 3.0.0, and adds *hive.vectorized.ptf.max.memory.buffering.batch.count* and *hive.vectorized.testing.reducer.batch.size* to HiveConf.java.

*hive.vectorized.testing.reducer.batch.size* is for internal use only so it doesn't need to be documented in the wiki.  The other two need to be documented here:

* [Configuration Properties -- Vectorization | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-Vectorization]

Added a TODOC3.0 label.

([~mmccline], please set the fix version to 3.0.0.  Thanks.)
